mapper.select: SELECT comment4_no, board4_no, comment4_content, comment4_regdate, comment4_isshow, member_id, member_name, member_class FROM comment4 WHERE board4_no=${board4_no} AND comment4_isshow='Y' ORDER BY comment4_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment4(board4_no, comment4_content, comment4_regdate, comment4_isshow, member_id, member_name, member_class) VALUES(#{board4_no},#{comment4_content},now(),'Y',#{member_id},#{member_name},#{member_class})
mapper.update: UPDATE comment4 SET comment4_content=#{comment4_content} WHERE comment4_no=#{comment4_no}
UPDATE comment4 SET comment4_isshow='N' WHERE comment4_no = #{comment4_no}
